data.text: @Sabbribb @MayorRobBurton 3. the world is getting rid of these mandates/restrictions.  New Zealand High court ended the vaccine mandates calling it, "It's a gross violation of human rights" the list continues to grow of countries tossing it out but we in canada have dictators in charge.

@Sabbribb @MayorRobBurton 2. absolutely vile.  It's creating tribalism with groups of people, it's like you're marked as a "Tainted" human who isn't allowed to participate in society. Even with all the information available out there they force you to follow only their information.

@Sabbribb @MayorRobBurton 1.They will never do that unfortunately the elites in power are absolutely loving how much power they have over our every day lives, I know countless amounts of people who have lost their jobs and become suicidal. What they've done to these people by trying to force injections is
@MayorRobBurton Rob, please send us the data that shows 3 doses helps prevent disease transmission.   This statement is at odds with the CDC and the science outside of Ontario.
@Sabbribb @MayorRobBurton They didn't uphold our collective need to work together and stay safe. No.
@MayorRobBurton Then rescind or ammend your vaccine policy.  Rehire those whom your corporation kicked out on the curb for upholding their rights.

@MayorRobBurton Thank you @MayorRobBurton and MOH for wasting 3 months of our childrenâ€™s lives locked up at home because of your useless and unscientific measures. A day is coming when you realize the huge mistake you have done.
@MayorRobBurton You never should have required it in the first place. Unscientific. Illogical. Just like all of the pandemic restrictions.
